PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08762024-07-11ESDC, DIPD
ActAccessible Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of LUCILLE LINDA BERLINGUETTE-SAUMURE of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a director of the Canadian Accessibility Standards Development Organization, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective August 26, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
